bill_title: exempt certain amateur sports coaches from sales and use tax.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain amateur sports coaches from sales and use tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: There are exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the tax imposed by this chapter, gross receipts of any person coaching an amateur team that is sponsored by a nonprofit organization that has been recognized as an exempt organization under section 501(c)(19) of the Internal Revenue Code. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: There are exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the tax imposed by this chapter, gross receipts of any person coaching an amateur team that is sponsored by a nonprofit organization that has been recognized as an exempt organization under section 501(c)(19) of the Internal Revenue Code. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
